example.text: Joe Biden's open-border policies created the humanitarian and national security crisis at our southern border. This week, the House will vote on HR 2, the Secure the Border Act. I spoke on the House Floor about [[user]]’s plan to alleviate this crisis. Watch ? ? [[url]]
I enjoyed discussing how we can work together to serve our communities. Thank you for having me!

The House of Representatives just passed HR 2, the Secure the Border Act, to secure our southern border and combat illegal immigration. [[user]] is fulfilling its promise to create a nation that is safe! [[url]]
I was happy to see this pass the House of Representatives. It's time to end Joe Biden's war on American energy.

Joe Biden's open-border policies created the humanitarian and national security crisis at our southern border. This week, the House will vote on HR 2, the Secure the Border Act. I spoke on the House Floor about [[user]]’s plan to alleviate this crisis. Watch ? ? [[url]]
I applaud [[user]]'s actions to reaffirm the United States' strong commitment to the State of Israel. Thank you for your leadership! [[url]]
